title: AMAZING 2B2B APT, Minutes to T & I-93, 5 Miles to Boston, No Fee
posting_body: COMMUTERS' DREAM!!
Minutes to T station, route I-93, Marina Bay, Wollaston Beach!
Huge, beautiful 2-bedroom apartment in North Quincy's prime location.
2 full bathrooms, one with jacuzzi.
Smart layout, elegant open floor plan with ample storage space.
Kitchen with stainless steel appliances.
Master bedroom with walk-in closet.
Large, private balcony.
Top-quality central air.
In-unit laundry, extra storage same floor, gym, sauna room, and swimming pool.
1 assigned parking spot, plus, plenty of additional parking in gated parking lot.
Bonus: Spectacular vista view of Neponset river and Boston skyline from the building's main gate.
Unfurnished, but 2 mounted TVs, some furniture and decor may stay, if desired.
UNBEATABLE LOCATION - close to EVERYTHING:
- 5 miles to Downtown Boston;
1 mile to Marina Bay and Wollaston Beach
- 10-minute-walk to North Quincy T station; 3-minute-drive to I-93
- Next to parks, jogging trail, biking path; close to Target, Stop & Shop, CVS, restaurants, and everything Quincy has to offer!
- Very well-maintained neighborhood, and highly-rated school district.
Available immediately for 1-year lease, first, last and security due for moving in, NO BROKER FEE.
Monthly rent covers cold & hot water, snow removal, trash removal, sewer.
Tenant is responsible for internet and electricity bills.
Sorry, no smoking and no pets.
Proof of income and credit score over 670 required.
Please email or text to schedule a showing.
Virtual tour available.
